name: enabled
label: Use Boundless Basemaps
description: Add Boundless base maps to all new projects

name: maps_uri
label: BCS available maps URI
description: URI to get the available base maps

name: first_time_setup_done
label: First time configuration run
description: The boundlessbasemaps plugin first time configuration has been executed

name: project_template
label: Override template for default project boundlessbasemaps
description: This path is normally blank but can be set to an alternative template for the default project
